root: ^This is an alternative controller RPG. Put your glove on!

Iron_Region: ^The Iron Region, formerly wealthy from a stable iron manufacturing economy, is now a shadow of its former self.
^While digging deeper and deeper to find iron, they discovered a mineral know as Beholderite.
^Beholderite was a novelty. It channeled old, good memories into those who touched it. People had visions.
^Visions of their younger, happier life. Visions of family, now deceased. Sadly, the Beholderite's effect was fleeting.
^Its power did not last, and there was never enough of it. One can only speculate the power of a great supply.
^People went crazy to find more of the vanishing gem. To see those that they lost one more time.
^These desperate people did things that tore apart the fabric of society. Soon, the King became powerless.
